revised_title: Further Researches into the Properties of the Sulphate of Iodo-Quinine or Herapathite: Crystallography and Optical Relations
tldr: The author investigates the properties of the Sulphate of Iodo-Quinine or Herapathite, focusing on its crystallography and optical relations. The study reveals the development of complementary prisms and the existence of two varieties of hexagonal crystals. The author also discusses the substance's chemical characters and solubility in various solvents.
